tuv.seg: Dáil Éireann is one of the Houses of the Oireachtas, the national parliament
Is ceann de Thithe an Oireachtais é Dáil Éireann
Dáil Éireann is located in Dublin
Is é an tOireachtas ár bparlaimint náisiúnta
The Dáil consists of members of the Dáil or TDs – Teachta Dála
Tá an Dáil déanta suas de bhaill na Dála nó Teachtaí Dála
They are also known as Deputies. TDs are elected directly to the Dáil in a general election
Bíonn TD tofa díreach chun na Dála ag muintir na hÉireann le linn olltoghcháin
If a vacancy occurs at the Dáil, the seat will be filled by a bye-election
Má bhíonn folúntas sa Dáil, déanfar an suíochán a líonadh trí fhothoghchán
There is a list of current TDs, grouped alphabetically by name or by constituency
Tá liosta Teachtaí Dála, grúpáilte in ord aibítre de réir ainm nó Teachtaí Dála grúpáilte de réir toghcheantair ar fáil
The Constitution states that the number of TDs cannot be more than one for every 20,000 of the population and cannot be less than one for every 30,000

Léiríonn Bunreacht na hÉireann nach féidir ach le Teachta Dála amháin in aghaidh gach 20,000 duine suíochán a bheith aige/aici sa Dáil agus nach féidir leis an uimhir a bheith níos lú ná duine in aghaidh gach 30,000 duine
There are currently 158 TDs
I láthair na huaire tá 158 TD againn
The country is divided into 40 constituencies and every constituency must elect at least three members to the Dáil
Tá an tír roinnte i 40 Dáil cheantar agus tá ar gach Dáil cheantar triúr, ar a laghad, a thogh chun na Dála
As far as possible, the ratio of population to TD must be equal in each constituency
Chomh gar agus is féidir, ní mór don chóimheas Teachta Dála agus daonra a bheith mar an gcéanna i ngach Dáil cheantar
The constituencies must be revised at least once every 12 years, although in practice they are revised after the census is published every 5 years
Tá athbhreithniú le déanamh ar na dáil cheantair gach 12 bliain ach is gnáthach go ndéantar é tar éis Daonáirimh a tharlaíonn gach 5 bliana
An independent Constituency Commission is appointed to draw up a revised scheme of constituencies which is then given effect by an Act of the Oireachtas
Ceaptar Coimisiún Toghlaigh neamhspleách chun scéim toghcheantar athbhreithnithe a dhréachtú a gcuirfidh i bhfeidhm tríd Acht an Oireachtais
TDs represent and work on behalf of the electors in their constituency
Déanann Teachtaí Dála ionadaíocht ar son na dtoghdóirí ina nDáil cheantar agus déanann said obair dóibh
The maximum life of the Dáil is 5 years, although at any time the Taoiseach may advise the President to dissolve the Dáil
Ní féidir leis an Dáil dul thar 5 bliana ach is féidir leis an Taoiseach, ag aon am, iarradh ar an Uachtarán an Dáil a lánscoir
You can view information on the weekly schedule in the Houses of the Oireachtas
Féadfar faisnéis a fheiceáil ar sceideal seachtainiúil Thithe an Oireachtais
